text: Y Graig, three miles west of Abergavenny, is the site of an abandoned settlement, known to have been occupied in the 18th and 19th centuries. It is a Scheduled Ancient Monument in the care of Cadw. ==See also== Sugar Loaf Mountain (Wales) ==References== Flickr photo gallery of Y Graig Abandoned Communities: Y Graig Category:Former populated places in Wales
title: Y Graig
